Description.Text: Hotel offers 144 double & twin superior rooms, 57 family rooms, 82 superior bungalows & 52 standard bungalows, 25 Single rooms, 2 presidential suites and 10 rooms specially designed for handicapped people. All with self controlled 24h air-condition, VINGCARD electronic lock, ELSAFE safe box, Sat -TV, hair drier, telephone, fridge, balcony or terrace, wi fi & ADSL available. Other Facilities: 4 Restaurants, a Greek tavern, one a la carte Italian restaurant and one more ethnic a la carte restaurant, pool snack bar, beach bar, cafeteria, cocktail bar, disco indoors and out doors, 2outdoor pools & 1 paddling pool, 1 indoor pool, water slides, 2 tennis courts (1 floodlighted), children\'s-playground, pedaloes, canoes, wind surfing, scuba diving, waterskiing, card room, billiards, archering, table tennis, beach football, beach volley, shopping arcade, Supermarket, hair-dresser, boutique, jewellery shop, laundry and dry cleaning service, exchange office, beach towel service, beach chairs and umbrellas by the pool and the beach, large gardens and SPA.

Hotel is situated on the sandy beach of Amoudara, and is an ideal location offering a variety of guest rooms, restaurants and conference facilities.. Distances from Apollonia Beach Resort & Spa: Knossos - 7km Phaistos - 30km Fodele (El Greco Museum) - 3km Heraklion Center - 4km Pankritio Stadium (Footballstadium) - 3km Golf course - 25km
